replies.body:
The *Vintage* version of Championship Riven is going to be exclusive for those players who owned her prior to the re-release of the skin. This is the skin that includes the crown and special glowing particle on her sword when using her ult. The players that pick up her skin during the re-release will get the new reworked skin, but not the *Vintage* skin that original owners do.

Our complete rundown on this change is outlined in [this post](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/M3soEg9r-an-update-on-championship-riven). Let me know if you have any questions.
I do have a question ,If i unlock it through hextech crafting or mystery gifting,which version do i get ? O.o

The official announcement hasn't gone out yet, so there aren't any details regarding whether you can get the skins through any other means than the store. Definitely keep your eyes on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for that info.
